chunks.chunk_text: 歡迎收聽通勤學英語我是 John 老師為了可以給你更多有趣讓你有英語記站力的內容我們一趁 Live Podcast 暑休的時期除了建立我們新的單元週末幕後教室式的 Teacher's Lounge 單元也在廣納招募不同專業的老師還有進行通勤學英語 2.0 的規劃請你拭目以待喔!一有新消息會公告給你到時記得要立馬行動啦!

chunks.chunk_text: 所以要記得喔!John 老師跟老師群推出的活動或課程是為了鼓勵大家積極學習其實都是找鳥的先行者折扣是最優惠的折扣期結束後也不會像其他的品牌沒事就打折促銷的最主要的還是讓需要的你能夠受惠提升英語力這樣子我們的心血對你才會有幫助喔!請大家拭目以待!

chunks.chunk_text: Do not seek professional help.This highlights the pressing need to address the critical concerns of early onset depression and low treatment seeking rates among the youth population in Taiwan.To mitigate these challenges, the Listen to Young Hearts initiative commences on August 1st, offering young individuals aged 15 to 30 three free counselling sessions to encourage proactive help-seeking behaviour.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_每日英語跟讀 Ep.K627_ 台灣年輕的心有我傾聽計畫關注青少年心理健康.json

chunks.chunk_text: One of the key objectives of the program is to raise awareness about available counselling services and improve accessibility to mental health resources.Additionally, the initiative aims to enhance the referral process for high-risk cases, ensuring those in dire need of support are efficiently connected to appropriate services.The Ministry of Health and Welfare envisions the Listen to Young Hearts initiative as a beacon of hope.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_每日英語跟讀 Ep.K627_ 台灣年輕的心有我傾聽計畫關注青少年心理健康.json

chunks.chunk_text: Empowering young people to seek help and promoting a comprehensive mental health support network.Collaboration with the Ministry of Education is part of the holistic approach to establish a campus suicide case care and referral process.Furthermore, the introduction of the Australian Mental Health First Aid Kit aims to create a supportive environment that fosters better mental health understanding and
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1442509198_podcast_1304_每日英語跟讀 Ep.K627_ 台灣年輕的心有我傾聽計畫關注青少年心理健康.json

chunks.chunk_text: empathy.By taking these decisive steps, Taiwan strives to cultivate an environment that encourages young individuals to prioritize their mental well-being and embrace the available resources.The Listen to Young Hearts initiative serves as a stepping stone towards building a society that acknowledges the significance of mental health and provides unwavering support to its younger generation.
